title: Mr. Hobbs's state of nature considered in a dialogue between Philautus and Timothy to which are added five letters / from the author of the Grounds and occasions of the contempt of the clergy.
author: Eachard, John, 1636?-1697.
publisher: Printed by E.T. and R.H. for Nath. Brooke,
notes: Each of the five letters has a special t.p.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
